ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 430
ygData.msgSnippet: ... For the record, does Luclin run slow for everyone? The only time I ever go up there is to get spells for my Druid because of the major lag I have had there
ygData.messageBody:
> Yeah, found out about that a few days after Luclin
> came out, still haven't gone up there to try it out...
> Got a strong aversion to Luclin mostly due to how
> poorly it ran when I went up there the first few
> times. ;) (also I tend to be a creature of habit,
> sticking to zones I know :)
>

For the record, does Luclin run slow for everyone? The only time I ever go
up there is to get spells for my Druid because of the major lag I have had
there ever since it came out. It takes me twice as long to zone there than
it does anywhere else in the game.

Damasciss Kyndhardt
27 Druid
E'ci
